content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's indeed talk about the rental price. I am aiming high, so please make your first proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to start with an overly high proposal, as I'm aiming for the lowest possible price. How about I consider a fair offer after we've discussed lease term conditions and additional responsibilities? TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
